summary: In Chapter 23, Jack resolves to escape the oppressive confines of the building that has trapped him and his fellow residents. He calls a meeting in the common area, sharing his insights and igniting a flicker of hope among them. Together, they venture into the haunting basement, uncovering a hidden passageway during their search for freedom. As they navigate the ominous corridor, they face the building's retaliatory tremors that reflect its dark will to keep them captive. The group bands together against
